app.name: Airnest
app.subSlogan: Stay light, stay free, yet always feel at home

datePicker.localTimeNote: All times are in the property's local timezone
datePicker.needConfirmation2: Requires confirmation, may be affected by cleaning time

profile.avatarTypeLimit: Only JPEG, PNG or WebP images are allowed

property.title: Title

property.sharedRoom: You'll be sharing a room in a managed hostel

property.dragDropImages: Drag and drop images to reorder. The first image will be the main image.
property.updateError: An error occurred while updating. Please try again.
property.deleteImageConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

addProperty.title: Add a property
addProperty.categoryDescription: Which of these best describes your place?
addProperty.placeTypeDescription: What type of place will guests have?
addProperty.locationNote: Your address will only be shared with guests after they book.
addProperty.basicsDescription: Share some basics about your place
addProperty.basicsNote: You can add more details later.
addProperty.photosDescription: Add some photos of your place
addProperty.photosNote: Show guests what your place looks like including the surroundings.
addProperty.detailsDescription: Set your price and finish up
addProperty.detailsNote: Write an engaging title and description to help more people see your listing!
addProperty.formIncomplete: Please complete all required fields before continuing.
addProperty.descriptionPlaceholder: Share what makes your place special...
addProperty.timezoneHelp: This helps guests understand check-in/check-out times in their local timezone
addProperty.dragImages: Drag images here or click to upload
addProperty.uploadImagesLimit: You can upload up to {maxImages} images (max {maxSizeMB}MB each)
addProperty.dragPicturesHint: Drag pictures to reorder. Click 'Set as Main' to select the featured image.
addProperty.createFailed: Failed to create property. Please try again.
addProperty.updateFailed: Failed to update property. Please try again.
addProperty.removeImagesFirst: Remove some images before uploading new ones
addProperty.tooManyImages: Too many images. Maximum allowed is {maxImages}
addProperty.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only images are allowed
addProperty.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is {maxSizeMB}MB

entire.title: An entire place
entire.description: Guests have the whole place to themselves.

room.title: A room
room.description: Guests have their own room in a home, plus access to shared spaces.

shared.title: A shared room in a hostel
shared.description: Guests sleep in a shared room in a managed hostel with staff on-site 24/7.

properties.noListedProperties: You haven't listed any properties yet. Add your first property to start hosting!

myreservations.checkOutInstructions: Please check out before 11:00 AM on your departure date
